meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended the injectable medication for quick relief.
meanings.sent2: The injectable solution was easy to administer.
meanings.sent3: The injectable flu shot made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an injectable dose of motivation.
meanings.sent5: The injectable treatment was as effective as a magic potion.

meanings.definition: A substance that can be injected into the body
meanings.sent1: The nurse prepared the injectable before the procedure.
meanings.sent2: He carried the injectable in a sealed container.
meanings.sent3: The injectable seemed to dance in the syringe.
meanings.sent4: His words were an injectable of hope in a time of despair.
meanings.sent5: The injectable glowed like a tiny beacon of healing.
